abp-and-maxthon-body.message: Together, Maxthon and Adblock Plus allow you to experience a faster, cleaner web by eliminating annoying and malicious ads, disabling tracking and more. To help keep the web sustainable, support websites with Acceptable Ads (enabled by default).

feature-safe-body.message: With Adblock Plus avoiding tracking and malware is easy. Blocking intrusive ads reduces the risk of "malvertising" infections. Blocking tracking stops companies following your online activity.

BusinessInsider-tooltip.message: Business Insider article about Adblock Plus

footnote-must-comply.message: Participants cannot pay to avoid the criteria. Every ad must comply.

feature-faster-body.message: Block ads that interrupt your browsing experience. Say goodbye to video ads, pop-ups, flashing banners and more. Blocking these annoyances means pages load faster.

video-alt-text.message: Introduction to Adblock Plus video thumbnail

footnote-keep-free.message: We are able to keep our open source product free by charging large entities a fee for whitelisting services. For the other roughly 90 percent of our partners, these services are offered free of charge.

abb-android-badge-alt.message: Download Adblock Browser on Google Play

footnote-value-users.message: We listen to our users. If an Acceptable Ads proposal is flagged by our community for a legitimate reason, we will remove it from the whitelist.

feature-aa-body.message: Websites need money to stay free. Support them by allowing Acceptable Ads (enabled by default). Want to hide all ads? No problem. Learn how
